author: jshdesigns
post_text: April 25, 2019 at 3:36 AM#1Hi all,Attached is a macro that will create a new Form with 3 or 4 colors of your choice. Write down the RGB values (in percent) of the colors you want to add to the form. Run the macro and answer the questions. You can also choose if you want the form to crossfade or snap/chase between the colors as well.Let me know of any issues, or if you're interested in adding more colors or a similar macro using other attributes like Pan/Tilt.Enjoy!FilesColor Form Gen.xml16.75 kB – 153 Downloads
title: Color Form Generator
